name: Paddly
description:
PADDLY “A Pinball & Pong inspired Challenge Daily”

A long time ago, a mysterious figure named Paddly emerged. A charming, enigmatic Irish butler, Paddly's origins began with a reclusive inventor who uncovered an ancient manuscript. Merging its contents into a computer program, Paddly was born. 

Rapidly mastering the pong and pinball-inspired games, Paddly instinctively began serving up daily obstacles to challenge, entertain, and inspire players worldwide. 

“Learning is not attained by chance; it must be sought!”

Paddly is an experiment by LZRBRD to demonstrate how principles of decentralisation might be applied to different aspects of a game with the goal of creating fresh, fun experiences. With this experiment we seek to shift focus of casual games away from proprietary data harvesting to open, fair, and player-centric experiences. We hope by doing so we prioritise a fun experience and open collaboration. 

Let's learn together.
